title: Song of the Young People

tokens.lyric: We shout with joy, we rise and sing! The

lines.raw: [G]We shout with joy, we rise and sing! The [C]Will of God is [Am]done!

tokens.lyric: A new day dawns and the dream lives; the

lines.raw: [D7]A new day dawns and the dream lives; the [G]Son of God has come!

tokens.lyric: Fight bravely to crush Satan; God's power will be

lines.raw: [Em]Fight bravely to crush Satan; God's power will be [B]revealed.

tokens.lyric: In the children of our Father, the

lines.raw: [G]In the children of our Father, the [Am]Youth of [D]Harmony.

tokens.lyric: The darkness which has covered us in Him has been dispelled.

lines.raw: [G]The darkness which has covered us in Him has been dispelled.

tokens.lyric: The dawn breaks into daylight; we ring the morning bell.

lines.raw: [G]The dawn breaks into daylight; we ring the morning bell.

tokens.lyric: Thirty billion shall live in the bright white light of truth.

lines.raw: [G]Thirty billion shall live in the bright white light of truth.

tokens.lyric: Let us rise and march forward with Harmony of Youth.

lines.raw: [G]Let us rise and march forward with Harmony of Youth.

tokens.lyric: As children of the Heavenly power, we march against our foe;

lines.raw: [G]As children of the Heavenly power, we march against our foe;

tokens.lyric: The command comes and the world bows to our True Father's own!

lines.raw: [G]The command comes and the world bows to our True Father's own!

tokens.lyric: Beaming light unto the nations, we carry high our dream. Let us win

lines.raw: [G]Beaming light unto the nations, we carry high our dream. Let us win

tokens.lyric: out for our Father, we Youth of Harmony!

lines.raw: [G]out for our Father, we Youth of Harmony!
